price: If only you could see when they are stricken with terror, but there will be no escape, and they will be seized from a nearby place[25].
arabic: وَلَوۡ تَرَىٰٓ إِذۡ فَزِعُواْ فَلَا فَوۡتَ وَأُخِذُواْ مِن مَّكَانٖ قَرِيبٖ
footnotes: [25] i.e., from the place of Judgment to the Hellfire.
